nodes.text: Valera was an astronomical object located in the Valera system, a part of the Southern Core portion of the Colonies. At some point between 19 BBY and 3 ABY, an uprising against the Galactic Empire took place on Valera. Although the insurrection was quelled by the Imperial Star Destroyer Stalker under the command of Captain Akal Zed, the Imperial forces lost several support vessels during the fighting due to flawed planning on Zed's part.

Valera was first mentioned in the 1993 sourcebook Planets of the Galaxy, Volume Three, which was authored by John Terra for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Valera system, and therefore the celestial body Valera, within grid square L-13.
